name: REST API Integration
description: Build a Python client for a mock REST API with error handling and retries
prompt:
Create a Python REST API client in api_client.py that:

1. Connects to https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com
2. Implements GET, POST, PUT, DELETE for /posts endpoint
3. Adds exponential backoff retry (3 attempts)
4. Includes proper error handling with custom exceptions
5. Add type hints throughout
6. Write tests in test_api_client.py covering all methods
7. Ensure tests pass

Create a well-structured, production-quality implementation.
